00020 // the controller (this class does nothing if this is not set)
00021 @property (retain) NSFetchedResultsController *fetchedResultsController;
00022 
00023 // key to use when displaying items in the table; defaults to the first sortDescriptor's key
00024 @property (copy) NSString *titleKey;
00025 // key to use when displaying items in the table for the subtitle; defaults to nil
00026 @property (copy) NSString *subtitleKey;
00027 // key to use when searching the table (should usually be the same as displayKey); if nil, no searching allowed
00028 @property (copy) NSString *searchKey;

00030 // gets accessory type (e.g. disclosure indicator) for the given managedObject (default DisclosureIndicator)
00031 - (UITableViewCellAccessoryType)accessoryTypeForManagedObject:(NSManagedObject *)managedObject;
00032 
00033 // returns an image (small size) to display in the cell (default is nil)
00034 - (UIImage *)thumbnailImageForManagedObject:(NSManagedObject *)managedObject;
00035 
00036 // this is the CoreDataTableViewController's version of tableView:cellForRowAtIndexPath:
00037 - (UITableViewCell *)tableView:(UITableView *)tableView cellForManagedObject:(NSManagedObject *)managedObject;
00038 
00039 // called when a cell representing the specified managedObject is selected (does nothing by default)
00040 - (void)managedObjectSelected:(NSManagedObject *)managedObject;
00041 
00042 // called to see if the specified managed object is allowed to be deleted (default is NO)
00043 - (BOOL)canDeleteManagedObject:(NSManagedObject *)managedObject;
00044 
00045 // called when the user commits a delete by hitting a Delete button in the user-interface (default is to do nothing)
00046 // this method does not necessarily have to delete the object from the database
00047 // (e.g. it might just change the object so that it does not match the fetched results controller's predicate anymore)
00048 - (void)deleteManagedObject:(NSManagedObject *)managedObject;
